2014-15 Women's Golf Roster

Choose a Player:

Katie Reid

Position Player

Height 5-5

Class Senior

Hometown Dundee, Scotland

High School Grove Academy

Bio

Related

Historical

Biography

2014-15 (As a Senior): Competed in nine events in 2014-15 … Averaged 78.31 strokes over 26.0 rounds … Boasted a scoring average of +6.50 … Earned three top-20 finishes on the season … Earned the best finish of her college career at the Delta Gamma Challenge (Feb. 15-16), firing back-to-back rounds of even-par 71 to finish to tie for sixth place … Tied for 17th place at the MSU/Payne Stewart Memorial (Oct. 13-14) in Springfield, Mo., finishing at 15-over 228 (75-77-76) … Tied for 19th place at the UALR/Arkansas State Women’s Golf Invitational (March 30-31), finishing at 15-over 231 after three straight rounds of 5-over 77...Named to the Sun Belt Conference Commissioner's List for achieving a GPA of 3.5 or higher during the 2014-15 academic year.

2013-14 (As a Junior): Played in 10 events as a junior, averaging 84.23 strokes over 30 rounds on the season … Played her best tournament of the season at the season-opening Chris Banister Golf Classic (Sept. 1-3) in Jacksonville, Ala., finishing at 23-over 239 (83-80-76) … Her 4-over 76 to close the event was her low round of the season … Tied for 39th at the Sun Belt Championship (April 14-16) in Loxley, Ala., finishing at 42-over 258 (82-88-88) ... Named to Sun Belt Conference Commissioner's List for earning a GPA of 3.5 or higher.

2012-13 (As a Sophomore): Played in nine events as a junior, averaging 83.12 strokes over 25 rounds … Fired her low round of the year (77) in the opening round of the Rio Verde Invitational (March 8-10) before ending the tournament at 13-over par 157 (77-80) and finishing in a tie for 53rd … Tied for 42nd at the Sun Belt Championship (April 14-17) in Muscle Shoals, Ala., carding a 20-over par 236 (81-78-77) ... Named to WGCA All-America Scholar Team ... Named to Sun Belt Conference Commissioner's List for earning a GPA of 3.5 or better.

Prior to UALR: Attended Elmwood College after graduating from Grove Academy in 2010 … Tied for sixth in the Scottish Schools in 2009 … Won the East District Schools Championship in 2008, and placed second in 2010 … Helped Grove Academy to a third place finish at the Paul Lawrie schools team challenge … Won the 2009 St. Andrews Junior Ladies Open handicap … Top 16 Scottish Ladies Championship in 2011, and Top 16 Scottish Girls Championship in 2010 … Top 4 at the North of Scotland in 2010 … A finalist in the Ashley Reid Salver (Scottish Under-18’s) in 2009.

Personal: Full name is Katie Anne Reid … Born March 29, 1992 in Dundee, Scotland … Daughter of John and Anne Reid … Has one brother, Lewis … Majoring in criminal justice.
